adrFormatAddress: 503 Broadway 3rd floor, New York, NY 10012, USA

originalText.text: I purchased 2 suitcases and I have some questions on them. I emailed them at least 20 plus times and set up 2 phone calls and guess what NO call !   They can't ever make a phone call when they set the time. TUMI makes a nice suit case also.

text.text: I purchased 2 suitcases and I have some questions on them. I emailed them at least 20 plus times and set up 2 phone calls and guess what NO call !   They can't ever make a phone call when they set the time. TUMI makes a nice suit case also.

originalText.text:
Nice design but very poor quality and even worse customer service...  Not worth buying at this price point.

Two of the three pieces of luggage I ordered have failed ( zipper not functional ) within the first few uses..  Customer service is useless and it took me ~3 months to get a replacement bag.  Now I am going through it all over again on the second failure.

I thought the first failure was an anomaly but these bags are trash - stay away...

originalText.text: After 41 emails back and forth, I still have no luggage and have yet to get a concrete answer as to the status.  I have been given misinformation and keep being told that I will get tracking when it leaves the warehouse.  I have sent 4 emails today and have not had the courtesy of a reply.  My suitcase was ordered 9 days ago.

originalText.text: My holiday gift, a toiletry kit, split. I’m trying to request a fix or replacement but Away requires an order number. I don’t have one.

text.text: My holiday gift, a toiletry kit, split. I’m trying to request a fix or replacement but Away requires an order number. I don’t have one.

originalText.text: Received defective product.  Getting the run around, have not received replacement as promised after numerous emails and 1 months time.    No phone contact for customer service, it does not exist.  Away billed my credit card before product was even shipped.
